name: Bunday Clean_85% (iOS10-12)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
85% size. Install 'Bunday Clean' for normal character size

Optimised for iOS12. Downward compatible with iOS10&11 as well. Better Vietnamese support.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet

1.1: Fixed “ᴇ” on iOS12.4 - Pre-iOS12.4 users do NOT need to upgrade
